And if we don't find anything in the treasure chamber, we'll open the gate at the main entrance and call Inspector Legrand.

[The guardsman passes Ohi, puts the gun away and takes up position next to the gate so he has a good overview about what happens. While Ohi crosses his path, he looks at him as if he doesn't trust him.]
Of course.
Guard
Is... is he dead?
Threatening in the end
Just unconscious. Perhaps he can tell us who knocked him out.
decidedly content, challenging
Excellent.
Don't act all innocent! It was YOU!
I was in the treasure chamber with the director. YOU, on the other hand, had every opportunity to take the guard out.
verärgert
I found him unconscious! I wanted to open the gates.
And make it easier for the Raven to escape?
That does it! On the floor! Hands behind your head!
Weapon
Put the pistol away!
You'd like that!
Robert, be sensible!
Shut it!
What is he doing here?
Surprised, confused
What did you do?
[The guardsman looks at the guard and, then Ohi again.]
Stunned
ME?!
feisty
I didn't do anything. But I'll tell you what I'm going to do. I'm going to arrest YOU!
Constable Oliver can't honestly think that I'm the Raven!
He must realize that I never had a chance to set the bomb!
Although he may think that I could be an accomplice - as could he.
I'll grin and bear it. As long as he's nearby, he can't cause any trouble.
And if I have to get rid of him, I'm sure something will occur to me.
The clock is ticking. Sooner or later the constable will lose his patience and I'll lose my chance to get into the treasure chamber alone.
I had a look at the video recordings.
[The director gets keen-eared, looks up.]
Yes? And?
weak, full of hope
And? The treasures?
Shortly after we left the room, the video recordings stopped.
[The director falls back again.]
mocking
Bah!
They're useless.
Not at all. The video recordings are very interesting.
Thoughtfully, 'there is some truth to this'
Hmm.
Do you have any idea how we can open the gate?
We've got to open the main gate and call for back up!
No! You gave me five minutes and my time isn't up yet!
[The guardsman makes a dismissive gesture.]
Go to the rear area
Go to the front area
